section1.title: Deliver an optimized User Experience
section1.content: How a user interacts with and experiences your website will determine your impact. Utility, ease of use, and efficiency are key. Nuxt is built with a set of features that make this possible.

section2.title: Website Performance and Optimization test tool
section2.content:
The internet is full of slow and poorly optimized websites. It's time to change direction and make better and faster websites.

Introducing HeyStats - your toolkit to monitoring the dynamic progression of webpages' performance, accessibility, and SEO - all necessary statistics and results from one admin page. When integrated with our WordPress plugin, page statistics are automatic updated with each page save. Beyond the present metrics, delve into the complete historical records of performance.

Harness these statistics as a potent tool for enhancing your webpages, while adeptly tracing the effects of alterations - both positive and negative. It's the ultimate way to refine your pages and keep a keen eye on their journey to excellence.

contact.content:
Tuspe Design Oy, established in 2020, is a Finnish limited company behind the creation of HeyStats.

Don't hesitate to reach out in case you encounter any hurdles during registration or while using our product. Prior to sending your query via the form, take a moment to explore our FAQ page - your answer might just be a click away!
contact.message_placeholder: Describe the problem or request as precisely as possible.

faq.multiple_websites_question: I have several websites. Is it possible to get a discount?

pricelist.title: Pricelist
pricelist.DEAL1_INFO:
Tests for mobile view.

Three unique address results.

One version per page address, the change from the previous one is visible.

The plugin sends a new test request on page save.

The pages must be activated in the plugin or on this website.
pricelist.DEAL2_INFO:
Tests for mobile and desktop views.

Unlimited pages and results.

The plugin sends a new test request on page save.

The test results are stored for one year.
pricelist.DEAL3_INFO:
All the features of Gold.

Automatic recheck every two months for all previously tested pages and a summary of the results by email.
